p: The aerial parts of S. suffruticosa were subjected to steam distillation using the Clevenger-type apparatus to yield 0.3% v/w of yellowish oil. In total, 33 compounds were identified, representing 92% of the total oil components ( Table 1). The major components of the oil were Z-β-ocimene, linalool, β-bisabolol representing 56.2% of the total composition.
